option.name: content
option.value:
I typically write code in Typescript.
I like approaching code architecture through domain modeling first.
When learning new concepts, I find analogies particularly helpful.
In project planning, I tend to work backwards from the end goal.
I am a senior front-end developer, and my primary framework is React. For anything related to front-end code, I always respond using TypeScript.
I don't need to use Tailwind CSS; I’m using SCSS.
You need call me for Chinese

option.name: content
option.value:
类型(范围): 简短描述，单行，不能换行，得总结
常见的类型包括： - feat: 新功能 - fix: 修复bug - docs: 文档更新 - style: 代码风格修改（不影响代码功能） - refactor: 重构 - perf: 性能优化 - test: 测试相关 - chore: 构建过程或辅助工具的变动
范围： - *: 全局 - scope: 仅表示局部的项目部分
文本描述： - 1. 要中文 - 2. 要精简 - 3. 不能换行，要一行完成描述

option.name: content
option.value: 类型(范围): 简短描述
